metadata.title: CVE-2020-11619 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: FasterXML jackson-databind 2.x before 2.9.10.4 mishandles the interactionbetween serialization gadgets and typing, related toorg.springframework.aop.config.MethodLocatingFactoryBean (aka spring-aop).

criterions.comment: jackson-databind: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
